name: Fermi's Path
description: As a subatomic particle you start a journey into subatomic space! This arcade title takes you to the limits of your reaction speed - and with the powerful level editor you can create even harder challenges!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8 Processor: Intel or AMD 2.0-3.4 GHz Dual Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 512 MB DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: A small past time game . not bad to get if cheap . but one thing is annoying . we r travelling on a pipe and to see the other side to get the idea that we have any ooportunity or path there is not very good . we have to actually turn to see what is there .. and that is risky when we r at the end and we have to fail just because we can not see what path we should take !   anyway it is just u have to guide ur ball to finish .. i will give it recomended but get it on sale ..
